Comment: Counter point: Vance has the charisma of a rotten potato. Plus, if Trump is impeached, then it obviously means that the Democrats have the power to do the same thing to him if he steps too far out of line like Trump is currently doing.  Also, it's much easier to get the MAGA base energized to defend Trump because he is MAGA to them. Vance as previously stated, is like a rotten potato.   Like, as a topical example for May the 4th, imagine Darth Vader rallying fans of his to fight the Rebel Alliance. They'd be hyped as fuck. Now imagine Vader trying to rally his fans to fight the rebels on behalf of Grand Moff Tarkin. Sure the absolute hard core fanatics will keep going, but your more than likely going to lose a considerable amount of steam in the transition from Vader to Tarkin. Because while Vader is cool and badass, Tarkin is just a politician. One who happens to be in charge of the Death Star, but he's no Vader, not by a longshot.   So while Vance may be the VP, he is no Trump. He just does not have the charisma to get MAGA energized, and if the Democrats can impeach and remove "the untouchable" Trump, they can certainly impeach and remove Vance if he steps out of line again. Also, Democrats having the numbers to impeach and remove Trump, also means that they would take the House or Senate (preferably both), and thus a Democrat would become the new Vice President based on the presidential line of succession, which would be even more of a reason for Vance to stay in his lane, as otherwise if he himself was impeached, he'd be handing the Presidency back to the Democrats who would promptly clean house of Trump's cabinet and hopefully start going after them and the GOP like they should have done in 2021.
